name: Real Billiard 8 Ball: Snooker
description:
Do you like to play 8 Ball pool game! Let's play world's No.1 billiard game on Apple phone. Play the real Billiard Pool Table game on your mobile and become the best! Refine your skills in the practice arena then take on the world in 1-vs-1 matches.
Pocket Pool: Play against the computer AI with standard 8 ball rules. Here you will realize your dream to be master of billiard! Practice your skill at any time via Single Mode or Multi-player Mode. See your mini clip shots by pressing camera button.

GAME FEATURES:
> Practice (no time limit but no high score record, no rules)
> Two Player Mode: Straight Pool Game (with rules)
> Realistic 3D ball Shooter
> Melodious background music and interesting sound
> Touch the screen for control game stick
> 8 Ball pool billiard
> Challenging players

How to play:
1) Single Player Mode Or Practice (no rules for this mode)
The object of the game is to pocket your set of assigned balls. The more balls sink more experience you get. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike.
2) VS Mode: Player vs Player (with rules for this mode)

- When you play it once, you won’t stop.
- It will help you enjoy a pleasant time!
- Manipulating the stick with your finger to play the game to control the direction and the force to push to ball.
